name: Correct These Christmas Words Multiple Choice Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Christmas stocking & Xmas stocking.

	'The stockings were hung by the chimney with care in hopes that Saint Nicholas soon would be there.' From 'The Night Before Christmas' by Clement Clarke Moore.

Christmas cookies & Xmas cookies.

	Are you going to make some this year?

mistletoe.

	When two people stand under a clump of mistletoe, they are supposed to kiss!

questions.correct: Christmas presents & Xmas presents & Christmas present & Xmas present
questions.explanation:
Christmas presents & Xmas presents & Christmas present & Xmas present.

	Santa brings them!

Christmas decorations & Xmas decorations.

	Have you ever made paper chains for Christmas? Have you ever made chains from cranberries and popcorn?

questions.text: This one's a Christmas story by Dr. Seuss: Howdy grins toll grist miss.
questions.correct: How the Grinch Stole Christmas & How the Grinch Stole Christmas! & How the Grinch Stole Xmas & How the Grinch Stole Xmas!
questions.explanation:
How the Grinch Stole Christmas & How the Grinch Stole Christmas! & How the Grinch Stole Xmas & How the Grinch Stole Xmas!.

	I love the book and the old cartoon that they show on TV every year.

questions.text: This one's a Christmas carol: Rude off the read knows drain dear.
questions.correct: Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer & Rudolf the Red Nosed Reindeer & Rudolf the Red Nose Reindeer & Rudolph the Red Nose Reindeer & Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer
questions.explanation:
Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer & Rudolf the Red Nosed Reindeer & Rudolf the Red Nose Reindeer & Rudolph the Red Nose Reindeer & Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer.

	'...had a very shiny nose. And if you ever saw it, you would even say it glows.'

Santa Claus & Santa Clause.

	Ho, ho, ho! The jolly old gent is Santa Claus, of course, but provision has also been made for those who think of the movie "(The) Santa Clause".

questions.correct: Santa's elves & Santa's elf & Santas elves & Santas elf & Santa's elfs & santas elfs & santa elves
questions.explanation:
Santa's elves & Santa's elf & Santas elves & Santas elf & Santa's elfs & santas elfs & santa elves.

	They wear shoes with bells on the toes.

Christmas Eve & Xmas Eve.

	Some people open their presents on Christmas Eve--but I don't! I hope you have Happy Holidays!
